Welcome to cookies_utilities' documentation!
=============================================

This package is intended to provide useful functions and classes. Please see :doc:`cookies_utilities`.

Installation
************

You can install the release version from `PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/cookies-utilities/>`_.

.. code-block:: console

   pip install cookies_utilities

If you want to use the latest version that has not been released, clone `our GitHub repository <https://github.com/CookieBox26/cookies_utilities>`_ and install from the local directory.

.. code-block:: console

   git clone https://github.com/CookieBox26/cookies_utilities.git
   cd cookies_utilities
   pip install .

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   cookies_utilities.rst
